towns.name: 1 Hour Session
events: The hour start once we touch down at the top of the mountain

towns.name: 3 Hour Session
events: Best option for powder days at the resort
The hour start once we touch down at the top of the mountain

towns.name: 1 Day Session
events: Great option for those wanting a day in the backcountry
Day starts from sun up to sundown, extra fee's added to current price for hazardous conditions

towns.name: Weekend Session
events: Best option for a backcountry ski trip
This is also for weekdays, we we start at sun up and go all the way to sundown the next day
